text.tspan: Share of global consumption-based COâ‚‚ emissions vs. share of

Consumption-based emissions
include those from
fossil fuels and industry
. Land-use change emissions are not included.
Data source: Global Carbon Budget (2024); World Bank (2024); HYDE (2023); Gapminder (2022); UN WPP (2024)
